# Pull Request Checklist

Please ensure you have completed the following steps before submitting your PR:

- [ ] **Validation:** I have run `python scripts/build_api.py` and it verified my changes without errors.
- [ ] **Assets:** If I added a new entity (Creature, Item, etc.), I have added the corresponding image to `assets/` (if available).
- [ ] **Formatting:** My JSON files are valid and formatted correctly.

## Description of Changes

_Describe what you have changed or added._

## Related Issues

_Link to any related issues (e.g., Fixes #123)._
